basics.name: Alessandro Fabiani
basics.label: IT Architect
basics.summary: **IT Architect with 15+ years industry experience**, mainly focused on Microsoft's technologies applied on Enterprise environment.

work.summary: System architect of a Symfony project with a Docker Swarm cluster, continuous integration with unit and loading testing.

Worked as magento developer and technical lead for new e-commerce project or for support. As project manager I was in charge of the communication between Smile and clients, I planned deliveries, developments, managed dev team, advised clients. As developer I designed store locator, renting system, SEO plan, graphic upgrade, Back Office extension, etc... Technical environment: Magento, Solr, ElasticSearch, MongoDB, Percona, Redis, load-balanced servers. Accounts: Krys, Le comptoir santé (Cdiscount), Cultura, Chantelle, Chantelle US, Comtesse du Barry, Cityvision, Vertsloisirs, Darjeeling, etc...
highlights: Worked in one of the top french e-commerce company (Cdiscount)
Designed new features on a 10+ millions products magento

work.summary: Worked as Java and Dotnet developer to design corporate websites. I designed new screens, created contribution workflows, data feeds import, etc... Technical environment: Jahia, J2EE, LDAP, SSO. Accounts: Notaires de France (Real estate), Gallimard (Book editor), Bureau Veritas (Certification), BNP (Banking), AG2R (Insurance), Sanef (Highway), Aprionis (Pension fund), Lyonnaise des eaux (Water supply), etc...
highlights: Developped an live auction for real estate.
First technical lead on a project.

work.summary: PHP developer. Created an online training platform.
PHP developer. Created a CMS like website for an art gallery in Ireland.

education.institution: ESIGETEL, École supérieure d'ingénieurs en informatique et génie des télécommunications
